errors.tooLong: This field exceeds the maximum length of {max} characters

helpText.name: Your full name as it will appear on your resume.
helpText.website: URL of your website or portfolio.
helpText.summary: Concise summary of your profile and professional goals.

validation.briefSummary: Summary is too short, add more details

imageSuggestions.title: Image URL suggestions:
imageSuggestions.useFullUrl: Use a complete URL (starting with http:// or https://)
imageSuggestions.checkPublicAccess: Verify that the image is publicly accessible
imageSuggestions.useProfessionalImage: Use a professional and high-quality image
imageSuggestions.recommendedFormats: Recommended formats are JPEG, PNG or WebP

addressSuggestions.title: Address suggestions:
addressSuggestions.completeAddress: Make sure the address is complete and correct
addressSuggestions.validPostalCode: The postal code must be in a valid format for the country
addressSuggestions.officialCityName: Use the official name of the city
addressSuggestions.isoCountryCode: The country code must be a 2-letter ISO code (US, UK, CA, etc.)

helpText.company: Name of the company or organization where you worked.
helpText.position: Your job title or role at this company.
helpText.startDate: When you started working at this position.
helpText.endDate: When you left this position (leave empty if current).
helpText.summary: Brief description of your responsibilities and role.

validation.endBeforeStart: End date cannot be before start date
